EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Account.Name} {!Today} Application Deadline Friday February 21st.
Closed Circuit Rap Announcement
<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
Please see attached announcement for 2014 Closed Circuit RAP
To be held the week of March 24th 2014
Please contact your manager for application to apply.
Please contact with any questions:
Twila Brafford
tbrafford@danfoss.com
